docs.lead_paragraph: The panic in Brooklyn caused by the frequency of trolley accidents and their alarmingly fatal nature during the last twelve months has subsided.

headline.main: TROLLEY SCARE IS OVER; Brooklyn Cars Are No Longer Run at an Excessive Rate of Speed. A GOOD EFFECT ON REAL ESTATE Mayor Schieren Sees No Reason Now for Hesitation in Choosing Homes in Brooklyn -- Mr. McKelway's Views.

docs.abstract: Real Estate Interests Injured; Mayor Schieren and Mr. McKelway Interviewed on Improvement
docs.snippet: The panic in Brooklyn caused by the frequency of trolley accidents and their alarmingly fatal nature during the last twelve months has subsided.
